amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part D of House Report 118-466 to require the Treasury Department to report and brief Congress identifying all assets of the Iranian Government or covered persons valued at more than $5 million and requires a list of all licenses, statements of licensing policy, action letters, and all other sanction exemptions relating to Iran.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Treasury Department to report and brief Congress identifying all assets of the Iranian Government or covered persons valued at more than $5 million and requires a list of all licenses, statements of licensing policy, action letters, and all other sanction exemptions relating to Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nunn (IA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 167 (Roll no. 144).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nunn (IA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 167 (Roll no. 144).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
